iti41:4.1: “Te, bhikkhave, sattā suparihīnā ye ariyāya paññāya parihīnā.
iti41:4.2: Te diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhaṃ viharanti savighātaṃ saupāyāsaṃ sapariḷāhaṃ;
iti41:4.3: kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā duggati pāṭikaṅkhā.
iti41:4.4: Te, bhikkhave, sattā aparihīnā ye ariyāya paññāya aparihīnā.
iti41:4.5: Te diṭṭheva dhamme sukhaṃ viharanti avighātaṃ anupāyāsaṃ apariḷāhaṃ;
iti41:4.6: kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugati pāṭikaṅkhā”ti.
iti41:8.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
